title: Star System Schema
description: Configuration for a specific star system

canEnterViaWarpDrive.description: Whether this system can be warped to via the warp drive

destroyStockPlanets.description: Do you want a clean slate for this star system? Or will it be a modified version of the original.

enableTimeLoop.description: Should the time loop be enabled in this system?

factRequiredForWarp.description:
Set to the FactID that must be revealed before it can be warped to. Don't set `CanEnterViaWarpDrive` to `false` if
you're using this, that would make no sense.

mapRestricted.description: Should the player not be able to view the map in this system?

skybox.description: Customize the skybox for this system

startHere.description:
Set to `true` if you want to spawn here after dying, not Timber Hearth. You can still warp back to the main star
system.

travelAudioClip.description: Name of an existing AudioClip in the game that will play when travelling in space.

travelAudioFilePath.description: Relative filepath to the .wav file to use as the audio. Mutually exclusive with travelAudioClip.

assetBundle.description: Path to the Unity asset bundle to load the skybox material from

destroyStarField.description: Whether to destroy the star field around the player

path.description: Path to the material within the asset bundle specified by `assetBundle` to use for the skybox

$docs.title: Star System Schema
$docs.description: Schema for a star system in New Horizons
